name: name
description: The name of the input, which is submitted with the form data.

name: value
description: Optional initial value of the input.

name: disabled
description: If `true`, file input will be disabled.

name: describedBy
description: One or more element IDs to add to the `aria-describedby` attribute, used to provide additional descriptive information for screenreader users.

name: label
description: The label used by the file upload component.

name: hint
description: Can be used to add a hint to the file upload component.

name: errorMessage
description: Can be used to add an error message to the file upload component. The error message component will not display if you use a falsy value for `errorMessage`, for example `false` or `null`.

name: formGroup
description: Additional options for the form group containing the file upload component.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the form group (for example to show error state for the whole group).

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the form group.

params.name: beforeInput
params.description: Content to add before the input used by the file upload component.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to add before the input. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML to add before the input. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: afterInput
params.description: Content to add after the input used by the file upload component.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to add after the input. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML to add after the input. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the file upload component.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the file upload component.
